type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.Sync
type.description: Synchronises the contents of a destination directory with some source directories and files.

method.name: getDestinationDir
method.description:
Returns the directory to copy files into.

returns:The destination dir.

method.name: setDestinationDir
method.description:
Sets the directory to copy files into. This is the same as calling #into(Object) on this task.
param:destinationDir The destination directory. Must not be null.

property.name: destinationDir
property.description:
Returns the directory to copy files into.

returns:The destination dir.
